name: Apollousa, Bow of the Goddess
desc:
2+ monsters with different names, except Tokens
This card's original ATK becomes the number of materials used for its Link Summon x 800. Once per Chain, when your opponent activates a monster effect (Quick Effect): You can make this card lose exactly 800 ATK, and if you do, negate the activation. You can only control 1 "Apollousa, Bow of the Goddess".
